title: every day for the past 2 or so weeks from roughly 5-8pm ive been getting 200+ ping
body:
i know its not my internet because my ping is normal with every other server i test.  only leagues game servers do this.

http://imgur.com/UukEo41

as you can see, over 800+ pings i averaged 220 ms, yet when i ping google right after that i get 14ms.

running a tracert on the game server shows dramatic ping increases on the last 2 hops.  if its server related, which is what this makes it look like, why isnt the problem affecting more people?

replies.body:
Hey Ictus,

There's a problem with your ISP, because I'm seeing multiple people with Frontier having this issue. Please submit this in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attach your traceroute to it. You might also want to contact your ISP about it.

-DTN

Contacting ISP about what?

Hey guys, my internet is perfectly fine but riotdirect is giving me 30% packet loss, please fix.  

"So you're lagging?"

No I'm not lagging, everything is perfectly fine with everything else I do.  Run youtube 1080 on 5 PCs, Netflix HD on 3 TVs, download bittorrent, while playing CS:GO?  No problem.  It's just riotdirect is losing 30% of my packets and giving me 150-500 latency.  Just fix it, okay dudes!

I have had this problem for months.  

It's very frustrating.

if its my isp, why isnt the first ping spike till after its been passed off to riot?

Because of the path it's taking to Riot. The path to the ISP server is fine, but leaving it to head to Riot is not. This is something Riot and your ISP need to figure out. You don't have to submit a ticket if you don't want them to know, but the **Help & Support** board is for help from the community and Riot will not likely see this.

what is the point of a help and support board if riot doesnt even look at it lol.

i am sending them a ticket

> what is the point of a help and support board if riot doesnt even look at it lol.

Because more often than not the players can fix their issue themselves, and just need some information. Even if they can't fix it, they can often be pointed in the right direction. If you would have come here with any other ISP you probably could've gotten it fixed; several volunteers help out many in this way on the H&S board.
like clockwork now that its past 8 my ping is fine.

I'm so happy to see someone post this here. I've been having the exact same issue with only League for the past few weeks. I also have Frontier and it happens to me from roughly 7-10 pm Eastern. I'm right by the League server (Indiana) and normally get 17-20 ping. But at this time it's at a steady 100+ and remains constant until after 10 then goes back to normal. Internet is fine and the traceroutes I run points to the address that I'm pinging (league's). Every other game is fine. In the tracert, only the last line is the issue, every other hop is ~15 ms.

http://prntscr.com/9uwodv
